summary: New followers in Sleeping Giant Inn of Riverwood or new Followers Hall
descriptionHtml:
Riverwood Travelers v1.04

Find 14 new followers in Sleeping Giant Inn of Riverwood.
Optional:
Also I\'ve added a new building to \"house\" them all.
Followers Hall is just East of Whiterun along the road to the north.  It has all amenities for the followers and you.  A master bedroom, eating hall, kitchen, crafting, shrines, training, stables, storage and bunks.  The house was made by my wife, and you may know her attention to detail.  All storage containers are safe.

Note:
Only activate one ESP file at a time.
If you decide to use FOLLOWER - Riverwood Travelers - Followers Hall.esp you may have to strip and fire your current follower.  Their Base ID is the same but their reference is different.

The Followers:
Aces the Assassin
Annika the Ranger
Bal-rok the Beast
Britney the Battlemage
Connie the Conjurer
Eric the Warrior
Katianna the Spellsword (necromancer)
Khajz the Ranger
Rolgeir the Barbarian
Rose the Rouge
Tammy the Valkyrie
Val-rek the Vulture
Vanessa the Vigilant
Victor the Soldier

They will level with you up to 80 and heal themselves (most of the time)
They have Lightfoot and many many other perks in relation to their class.
They have gear and weapons already, which is fully removable.
They are Essential and should not effect your sneak meter.
They also should not attack until you do or they get hit first.
Their names are their general play style and are ready to go as soon as you meet them.
They should not experience \"Grey Face\" bug.

Followers Hall is only slightly WIP as far as minor tweaks to bring life to it, nothing game breaking.
Things I need some help with:
1. Weapon racks.  Those darn weapons will not \"stick\" to the racks. I\'ve copied the settings from other racks but they still just hover there.
2. Instrument Idle markers.  The followers will use them but there is no sound of them playing.
3. Training dummies animation.  I\'ve copied some settings from other NPC interacting with the dummies, but the Followers will not use any of them.
4. Proper Follower schedules.  Just so they will train, eat, go outside.  I got them to sleep though.

Depending on your mods they will not look exactly like this, but none of them are \"ugly\" IMO.

I use:
BODY - UNP Body v1.51 (by dimon99) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709
BODY - UNP Face & Body HQ v1.9 (by navetsea) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554
FACE -  Ethereal Elven Overhaul v1.0.5 (by nuska) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24273
author: E2B2
